name: 海賊魅影 卡特蓮娜
description: 對外來者而言，比爾吉沃特的政治似乎總充斥著卑鄙的惡棍和無恥的小偷。但貫穿始終的其實是錯綜複雜的忠誠、莊嚴的榮譽守則、和一種非常特定（血腥的）的行事準則。而將其全部斬斷的人正是卡特蓮娜，一位劍刃大師。她會在適當的時機讓適當的舌頭變得鴉雀無聲…以換取恰當的報酬。

wikiSkinData.lore: To outsiders, the politics of Bilgewater seem a mean mess of villainous scum and dishonorable thieves. But woven throughout are complex loyalties, solemn codes of honor, and a very specific (if bloody) way of doing things. Cutting through it all is Katarina, a master of the blade. She silences the right tongues at all the right moments… for the right price.
